Summary: four white round lights going in circle, clustering together and spreading apart
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Paterson
There were no other sightings in Paterson on or around October 23rd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI and my friends were driving over Garden State Parkway, NJ. We took the exit to Paterson I believe its 155p and suddenly my friend noticed some white light in the sky. Inititially we thought someone is throwing light in the sky or it is related to security lights. But later we saw that there were four white lights each of which was pretty huge in size. These lights would get spread apart from each other an then cluster back together. We drove for around 5 to 6 miles and they were above our car all this time playing in the sky in the same way, spreading apart and then clustering back together. This lasted for almost 15 to 20 minutes until they started fading away. Thanks!
